responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "7F9D5A734B95B50C5D24B8B703D68CF7", "Wow, you\'ve heard about that too? My cousin was traveling back to Lionhold one evening after dark and was attacked near the Trinnin River. They said it was unsettling, like a fallen soldier, though they couldn\'t see it clearly. We\'re all pretty shaken up.")
name: DD_Ambient_Lionhold_Villagers_21_Response
